p: At the opposite, Zohry et al. [ 50] tested toxicity of 10 essential oils on S. granarius by exposure to treated wheat in a protocol close to that of this study. Garlic oil was identified as the most toxic one with a concentration of oil per grams of grain similar to ours. However, no precision on composition of EOs are available in their publication, which do not allow a deeper comparison. Further studies on the evaluation of the industrial potential of essential oils need to be based on a common protocol taking into account the influence of the media [ 35] and a full description of the composition of essential oils.
